system.sustained: Psyker selects 1 individuals and two additional individuals per Degree of Success on Focus Power Test who are within range, creating a psychic link between themselves and these targets. As long as power is sustained, the psyker and targets may intuintively communicate telepathically with each other, not requiring a shared language or even similar modes of thought. However the psyker and all targets suffer -30 to Deceive Tests to lie to each others while under the effect of the power.
